title: Phisher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose someone to phish each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Phished players will be forced to target you.
- If your ability would cause you to be killed (including delayed kills, i.e. poison), it will be cancelled, and you will be notified.
- You will be notified if your target was immune to your phishing.
- Your target will **not** be notified that they were redirected.
- You are roleblock and redirect immune.

desc:
Post 654
*THIS IS [One Purchase] YOU WILL [Regret] FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFE!*
